COPT
M. S. NOVIK
300 West 23rd Street - Room 500 - New York 119 N.Y. Algonquin 5-43#5
Radio
Consultant
December 7th, 1953
Dear Harry2
Returning the letter to you. I am satisfied that Overton
means well and I have no reason to believe that he wouldn’t
break through the ice.
Evidently, even in the music field the whole problem is wide
open. I know Clair Meader too but of course would go to
Petrillo first. I guess hia closest contact is in the
motion picture field but I cannot understand what he means
by WI suppose the general theory that Brewer’s hostility
could do us a great deal of liarm in the film world.® T am
sure he is referring to Roy Brewer-who is a friend of mine—
but if it is a personal opposition, he is no longer with IATSE.
Anyhow, it is pretty obvious that very little has been done
in the entire field, and that there is room for a general
policy.•.
Sincerely,
MSNSS
